channel.title: automation on slash blog
channel.description: Recent content in automation on slash blog

item.title: Hugo
item.description: This weekend I took the opportunity of some downtime and the fact that I've deployed a new primary VPS (with the wonderful iocoop) to migrate my blog source to use hugo, leaving behind the Octopress setup I've had for a while. Why? Well I've been on a small Go kick recently at $DAYJOB and elsewhere and having played with some of the other utilities developed by spf13 such as cobra and admiring their ergonomics and simplicity I was keen to give hugo a try.
